The '''Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after completing the {{Quest|State of the Holy Lyre der Himmel}}.

During the Archon Quest ''[[State of the Holy Lyre der Himmel]]'', the [[Holy Lyre der Himmel]] is partially repaired by using a [[Clear Dvalin Tear]]. It is then [[Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel|completely repaired]] during ''[[Crystal Tears]]''.
